title: 775: BITCOIN COULD ‘CONSOLIDATE UNTIL 2022’ AFTER MASS WIPEOUT SENDS BTC PRICE TO $41K!!
description:
Bitcoin traded near $47,000 on Dec. 4 after a sudden crash confirmed bulls' worst nightmares with 22% daily losses.

BTC/USD hitting local lows of $41,960 on Bitstamp - its lowest since Sep. 30. As panic set in, leveraged positions unwound and traders capitulated, 24-hour cross-crypto liquidations passing $2.5 billion.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
